attributes.additional_details: Because they are spreading the virus with unnecessary contact
attributes.background: Cancel all football games to enforce social distancing

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban elite sports being played during lockdown 3
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566813
